snippet.title: SPYxANYA Operation Memories – Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Join in on the Forger fun when SPYxANYA Operation Memories releases on June 28, 2024! Check out the latest trailer to get ready for an exciting outing adventure in the world of #SPYxFAMILY!
*STEAM release date to be announced 

SPYxANYA will be available on PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, and Nintendo Switch. Learn more here: https://www.bandainamcoent.com/games/spy-x-anya-operation-memories

Follow Bandai Namco Entertainment: 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bandainamcous
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BandaiNamcoUS
Twitter: https://twitter.com/BandaiNamcoUS
Twitch: http://www.twitch.tv/bandainamcous
